LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.label: Handaxe
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.description: A practical wood cutting handaxe. Trees beware! Equipping this boosts plant work speed by 30%.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.label: Pickaxe
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.description: A practical mining pickaxe. We have to go deeper. Equipping this boosts mining work speed by 30%.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.label: Hammer
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.description: A practical construction hammer. Be careful with your fingers! Equipping this boosts construction work speed by 30%.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Sickle.label: Sickle
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Sickle.description: A sharp curved hook, used for gathering plants and harvesting grains.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Sickle.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Sickle.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Broom.label: Broom
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Broom.description: A tool for filling in pitted ground with smooth and beautiful fill.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Broom.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Broom.tools.1.label: shaft
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Broom.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Hoe.label: Hoe
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Hoe.description: A tool for working the soil of farms.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Hoe.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Hoe.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Multitool.label: Multitool
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Multitool.description: A high-tech set of tools commonly used by domestic mechanoids in glitterworld societies, though also usable by humanoids due to their physiological similarities.
